titles.title: Providing Complete Information to Retirement Investors Act
Providing Complete Information to Retirement Investors Act
Providing Complete Information to Retirement Investors Act

To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to ensure that pension plans provide notice to participants and beneficiaries on risks associated with certain investments, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 23 - 19.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Education and the Workforce. H. Rept. 118-224.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 183.

committee.name: House Education and Workforce
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
